appeng.api.networking.ticking

Interface ITickManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGridCache

    public interface ITickManager
extends IGridCache
    The network tick manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean alertDevice(IGridNode node)
      immediately sets the node to tick, only valid if your node is marked as "Alertable" in its TickingRequest Sleeping Devices Still Alertable, when your tile is alerted its new status is determined by the result of its tick.
      boolean sleepDevice(IGridNode node)
      disables ticking for your device.
      boolean wakeDevice(IGridNode node)
      enables ticking for your device, undoes a sleepDevice call.

      • Methods inherited from interface appeng.api.networking.IGridCache

        addNode, onJoin, onSplit, onUpdateTick, populateGridStorage, removeNode

    • Method Detail

      • alertDevice

        boolean alertDevice(@Nonnull
                    IGridNode node)
        immediately sets the node to tick, only valid if your node is marked as "Alertable" in its TickingRequest Sleeping Devices Still Alertable, when your tile is alerted its new status is determined by the result of its tick.
        Parameters:
        node - gridnode

        disables ticking for your device.

        Returns:
        if the call was successful.

      • wakeDevice

        boolean wakeDevice(@Nonnull
                   IGridNode node)
        enables ticking for your device, undoes a sleepDevice call.

        Returns:
        if the call was successful.
